name: Vallordume "The Prequel" (Silver Edition)
description: The updated and expanded  prequel game for Vallordume (vallor-dum) - Virtues and Blood.  A story of honor and treachery made with RPG Maker MV ©.  Take Zadarious a virtuous and noble warrior on a quest to the island kingdom of Utin and uncover the mystery of the missing princess.
